entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is introduced as someone who has taken a few steps down a new corridor when the window breaks open.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gigantic bearded figure who arrives at Harry's location. He is introduced as someone who clambered to his feet after hitting the opposite wall.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Hagrid's boarhound, which attacks Harry when it sees him. Fang is introduced as something large and furry that detached itself from the new arrival.

relationships.description: Harry meets Hagrid when he arrives at Harry's location. This is described in the text as 'Hagrid stooped down, bestowed upon Harry a cursory and rib-618'.
The relationship is bidirectional, so we also have Hagrid meeting Harry.
Harry is attacked by Fang when it sees him. This is described in the text as 'Fang the boarhound's attentions as the enormous bearded figure clambered to his feet'.
